title: TABLE-S.Korea's August coal imports up 14.6% y/y
text:
TABLE-S.Korea's August coal imports up 14.6% y/y

Commodities 2 hours ago (Sep 16, 2019 17:20)

© Reuters. TABLE-S.Korea's August coal imports up 14.6% y/y SEOUL, Sept 16 (Reuters) - South Korea's August coal imports rose by 14.6% from a year earlier to 12.64 million tonnes, customs data released on Sunday showed. Total coal imports are composed of steam coal for power generation and coking coal for steel production. Details of total imports in August are as follows: (In tonnes/ in $/T) Aug 2019 Aug 2018 Australia 3,754,726/ $115.33 3,289,112/ $123.07 Russia 2,823,958/ $ 83.83 2,755,723/ $107.61 Indonesia 2,386,055/ $ 62.01 2,807,490/ $ 71.98 Canada 1,912,082/ $133.58 961,188/ $151.90 Colombia 601,719/ $ 95.84 316,827/ $113.59 United States 519,977/ $155.50 136,724/ $142.67 South Africa 313,510/ $ 77.95 581,795/ $100.13 Mozambique 106,650/ $179.92 20,000/ $203.65 China 83,711/ $174.01 161,707/ $146.47 Austria 72,881/ $ 77.10 - New Zealand 65,003/ $151.38 TOTAL 12,640,273/ $101.69 11,030,565/ $108.78 Details of the January-August imports are as follows: (in tonnes/ in $/T) Jan-Aug 2019 Jan-Aug 2018 Australia 30,941,707/ $120.83 26,405,289/ $131.16 Indonesia 19,939,677/ $ 60.37 21,493,450/ $ 69.76 Russia 16,992,773/ $ 97.12 16,989,217/ $111.87 Canada 8,590,077/ $141.46 8,197,997/ $140.12 Colombia 3,669,028/ $101.28 3,586,265/ $102.03 South Africa 2,187,774/ $ 91.43 6,204,941/ $ 99.35 United States 2,158,724/ $175.25 2,661,728/ $159.09 China 870,263/ $168.35 1,035,548/ $148.65 Mozambique 516,296/ $203.09 474,724/ $212.35 Latvia 393,521/ $102.33 - New Zealand 192,949/ $154.75 196,261/ $156.12 Austria 72,881/ $ 77.10 - Switzerland 24,200/ $155.04 22,600/ $151.81 Mongolia 23/ $434.78 - Mexico 201,211/ $115.10 Singapore 150,898/ $106.62 India 57,900/ $ 72.45 Belgium 1,553/ $282.72 Philippines 195/ $395.48 TOTAL 86,549,893/ $105.01 87,679,775/ $111.20 Of the total imports, details of steam coal imports last month are as follows: (In tonnes / in $/T) Aug 2019 Aug 2018 Russia 2,334,408/ $ 73.74 2,147,121/ $ 96.03 Indonesia 2,331,560/ $ 60.25 2,807,490/ $ 71.98 Australia 2,253,468/ $ 77.52 2,534,405/ $ 93.29 Canada 1,040,753/ $ 73.89 380,910/ $ 94.56 Colombia 601,719/ $ 95.84 293,270/ $108.73 South Africa 313,510/ $ 77.95 581,795/ $100.13 United States 135,599/ $ 91.66 74,867/ $120.41 Austria 72,881/ $ 77.10 -
